events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but it doesn't fit me and I'd like to request a refund for the item.
The customer's request regarding refund for a purchased jacket has been categorized under the 'Refund' cluster.
Customer support agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the returned jacket item.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us about your refund request. I'm here to assist you with the process.
Could you please provide the order number and confirm if the jacket has been returned to our warehouse?
The order number is 87654321 and yes, I have already sent the jacket back through your recommended courier two days ago.
Thank you for that information. We will check the return status and process your refund within 3-5 business days once confirmed.
That sounds great, thank you for the quick response and clarity on the refund timeline.
We have confirmed the return delivery and completed your refund. The money should reflect in your account within 2 days.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received the refund and everything is resolved to your satisfaction.
Yes, I have received the refund today. Thank you very much for your help and prompt assistance!
We are glad your issue was resolved. Closing this case now. Thank you for contacting customer support.
